channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why most enterprise AI agents never reach production and how Databricks plans to fix it
item.description: Databricks Agent Bricks automates enterprise AI agent optimization and evaluation, eliminating manual processes that block production deployments.

item.title: Here’s how the 55% U.S. tariffs on China are broken down
item.description: President Trump, in a post on Truth Social, said the U.S. is “getting a total of 55% tariffs.”

item.title: ‘Generative AI helps us bend time’: CrowdStrike, Nvidia embed real-time LLM defense, changing how enterprises secure AI
item.description: Falcon is now built into Nvidia’s LLMs, delivering native runtime threat defense and eliminating blind spots across AI pipelines.

item.title: Databricks open-sources declarative ETL framework powering 90% faster pipeline builds
item.description: With Apache Spark Declarative Pipelines, engineers describe what their pipeline should do using SQL or Python, and Apache Spark handles the execution.

item.title: This Buffett favorite is one of 4 cheap stocks the ‘smartest money’ has been buying lately
item.description: It’s bullish when insiders invest their own money into their companies — especially when those executives and directors have a record of savvy timing.

item.title: Value investing is finally excelling again in 2025 — but there is one catch for Americans
item.description: The concept of value investing was pioneered in the U.S. roughly a century ago. But lately, the approach has had far more success abroad.
